name: multiplayer-chess-clock
description: Multiplayer chess clock webapp written with Purecsript

scripts.build: npm run bundle-css && npm run bundle-purs && npm run bundle-js && npm run clean-purs
scripts.prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run bundle-css && npm run bundle-purs && npm run bundle-js && npm run clean-purs
scripts.clean: rm -r output/; rm -rf dist/; rm -rf .cache/; rm public/tailwind.css; rm out.js
